backend/main.mo: Defines data types for users, documents, trades, compliance items, and other domain structures, including role comparison logic and storage references.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to source files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten descriptive summaries for numerous frontend files, mainly covering components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the root React container and main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router and app shell controlling authentication flow, profile setup, admin email mismatch banner, and page layout mounting.
frontend/src/auth/permissions.ts: Defines per-role capability mappings and utilities for checking permissions and determining visible modules.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Declares business role types and a normalization helper that maps strings to valid roles with a fallback.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: User management UI page gated by manage_users permission, displaying navigation, an invite button, and an empty-state users panel.
frontend/src/components/auth/PermissionG: Wraps children with permission checks, optionally disabling or hiding content based on user capabilities.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for users to input profile details and save them, with admin email detection and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Internet Identity login screen with logo fallback, error display, and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/components/bulk-upload/Bulk: Handles file selection, parsing, validation, sample downloads, and triggering bulk imports with error handling.
frontend/src/components/bulk-upload/bulk: Defines shared types for bulk upload configuration, summaries, and parsed rows.
frontend/src/components/calendar/AddDead: Dialog for creating regulatory deadlines with form validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/calendar/Deadlin: Groups deadlines by month and displays them in a calendar-style list with overdue highlighting.
Table view of deadlines with sorting, status badges, and an action to mark items as submitted.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsT: Displays a scrollable table of clients with PAN, address, document count, and creation date.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientUp: Modal form for creating or editing a client with PAN validation and submission via a createClient mutation.
frontend/src/components/common/AdminEmai: Shows a warning banner when the user’s email doesn't match the configured admin email, with a refresh action.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches fatal errors and displays a fallback screen with a reload option.
frontend/src/components/common/AppFatalE: Full‑page error screen showing an error message, troubleshooting tips, and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendEr: Displays backend error messages, detecting auth-related errors to show an 'Access Denied' title.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendHe: Shows a connectivity failure banner with a retry button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Generic empty-state card with optional illustration, title, description, and action slot.
frontend/src/components/margin/Collatera: Scrollable table listing collateral records including client ID, security details, values, and dates.
frontend/src/components/reconciliation/R: Displays reconciliation runs sorted by upload date with status badges and a view-details action.
frontend/src/components/reconciliation/S: Dialog showing up to 100 reconciliation statement rows with amounts, balances, and run metadata.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportTe: Grid of report templates showing name, description, category badge, and a select-template action.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/client: Validates client upload rows and converts them into BulkClient objects with PAN and required field checks.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/collat: Validates collateral upload rows and converts them into CollateralRecord objects with numeric, date, and required field checks.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/margin: Validates margin snapshot rows and converts them into MarginSnapshot objects with date and number validation.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/reconc: Validates statement rows and converts them into StatementRow objects with date, description, and numeric checks.
frontend/src/features/reports/reportTemp: Defines required data for report templates and maps backend data into formatted report rows based on template ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Checks backend health using the actor and exposes status flags via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and returns the current user profile using the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/usePermissions.ts: Determines the current user's business role and exposes permission checks and visible modules based on that role.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, clients, documents, and other backend data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode tokens, and utility classes for consistent UI theming.
frontend/src/layout/DashboardLayout.tsx: Renders the main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, user menu, permission‑based modules, and profile refresh/logout handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
Displays audit log entries with search, error handling, and optional export based on permissions.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientManagem: Manages clients with search, table view, creation modal, and bulk upload via CSV.
frontend/src/pages/compliance/Regulatory: Shows regulatory deadlines in list or calendar view with ability to add new deadlines.
frontend/src/pages/config/ConfigurationH: Landing page for configuration sections like exchanges, users, and integrations with permission gating.
frontend/src/pages/config/ExchangeSettin: Provides a placeholder view for configuring exchange connections and credentials.
frontend/src/pages/config/IntegrationsPa: Displays integration settings with a notice and placeholder for configuring external systems.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/components: UI panel for manually entering trades, handling validation, form state, and a local list of added trades.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/tradeImpor: Defines manual trade entry schema and validation rules, including required fields and numeric checks.
Parses CSV trade files using a shared CSV parser and validates file type.
Validates parsed trade rows against required columns and converts them into Trade objects with detailed row-level checks.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/TradeImpor: Handles trade import via file upload, parsing, validation, and viewing imported trade history.
frontend/src/pages/HowToUseGuidePage.tsx: Displays a detailed user guide explaining platform features, roles, and onboarding steps.
frontend/src/pages/margin/MarginCollater: Page for uploading and viewing margin snapshots and collateral data using bulk upload components and validations.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 page with a message and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Shows dashboard metrics, a link to the usage guide, and summary cards using data from backend metrics.
frontend/src/pages/reconciliation/BankRe: Manages bank statement uploads for reconciliation and displays reconciliation runs, with validation and import handling.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportLibrary: Displays searchable report templates and navigation for generating or scheduling reports.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportWizardP: Provides a UI to select a report template, validate required data, generate a report, and download it as CSV.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ScheduledRepo: Displays scheduled report automation with an option to create new schedules using permission gating.
frontend/src/pages/surveillance/Surveill: Shows surveillance alert metrics and tabbed alert queues with empty states for different alert categories.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and identifies schema-related decoding issues.
frontend/src/utils/bulkUploadFileParsing: Parses CSV files into structured rows with header validation and rejects unsupported formats.
Provides generic validators for required fields, numbers, dates, and row-level error construction.
frontend/src/utils/export.ts: Exports data to downloadable CSV or JSON files using blob-based browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/sampleDownloads.ts: Safely downloads sample files while detecting HTML fallback responses and blocking invalid downloads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/src/validation/pan.ts: Defines a regex for PAN format and a helper function that validates a PAN string.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to admin-email mismatch warnings in the app.
